info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:16AM CDT until May 07 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McCurtain County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northern Franklin County in northeastern Texas... Northwestern Titus County in northeastern Texas... Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1216 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Manchester, or 19 miles northwest of Clarksville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Hagansport, Idabel, Broken Bow, Bogata, Bagwell, Manchester, Wright City, Valliant, Detroit, Deport, Talco, Millerton, Garvin, Rufe, Smithville, Hochatown, Watson, Battiest and Pickens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
